subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius’s agent said he was canceling all of the runner’s future races so Pistorius could concentrate on defending himself against charges that he murdered his girlfriend.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius’s agent said he was canceling all of the runner’s future races so Pistorius could concentrate on defending himself against charges that he murdered his girlfriend.
